snippet: British Pathé has posted on YouTube about 85,000 film clips, including newsreels and little-seen footage from all over the world.
abstract: British Pathé has posted on YouTube about 85,000 film clips, including newsreels and little-seen footage from all over the world.

headline.main: A Trove of Old Film Footage, Now Online
headline.print_headline: 85,000 Newsreel Clips Uploaded by British Pathé
